about_the_game:
Civilization has turned STONE. Prologue (Apocalypse) link below!
Revive the people, terraform the world, defend against the apocalypse, and rebuild civilization from the stone age to advanced technology!

Dust and statues are all that’s left - it’s up to you now, survivor.

A Survival Crafting Base Building Game

  • Gather dust and craft your way up to rebuilding civilization, from the stone age to advanced technology.

  • Revive people from the stone and build homes for them to work at your base.

  • Build new workstations and machines.

  • Make water and food to maintain your character in the harsh apocalypse.

  • Defend your base against mutants from the apocalypse using melee/ranged weapons and defense structures like wooden spikes and castle walls.

  • Terraform the world by building machines to alter the atmosphere and watch the world transform to its original state.

  • Follow a tech tree to advance your technology and always know what to do next.

Prologue (Apocalypse) link below!
detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE PROLOGUE (FREE DEMO)!


About the Game

Civilization has turned STONE. Prologue (Apocalypse) link below!
Revive the people, terraform the world, defend against the apocalypse, and rebuild civilization from the stone age to advanced technology!

Dust and statues are all that’s left - it’s up to you now, survivor.

A Survival Crafting Base Building Game

  • Gather dust and craft your way up to rebuilding civilization, from the stone age to advanced technology.

  • Revive people from the stone and build homes for them to work at your base.

  • Build new workstations and machines.

  • Make water and food to maintain your character in the harsh apocalypse.

  • Defend your base against mutants from the apocalypse using melee/ranged weapons and defense structures like wooden spikes and castle walls.

  • Terraform the world by building machines to alter the atmosphere and watch the world transform to its original state.

  • Follow a tech tree to advance your technology and always know what to do next.

name: World Turned Stone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050-TI or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Civilization has turned STONE. Revive the people, terraform the world, defend against the apocalypse, and rebuild civilization from the stone age to advanced technology! Prologue link below.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
